## prepareLeapSporeUnsignedPsbt() function

Prepares an unsigned PSBT (Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction) for leaping a spore from Bitcoin to CKB. This function is used to estimate transaction fees before finalizing the transaction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
prepareLeapSporeUnsignedPsbt: ({ toCkbAddress, sporeTypeArgs, collector, isMainnet, btcTestnetType, fromBtcAddress, fromBtcAddressPubkey, btcDataSource, btcFeeRate, btcService, }: PrepareLeapSporeUnsignedPsbtParams) => Promise<bitcoin.Psbt>
```
